item.title: Here I Am
item.description: Hello there. Welcome. I find it strange that you are here, reading this. What does it say about you that you are? What does it say about me that I even wrote this in the first place? I am just a lowly data scientist who put this site together to provide materials to students who hope to learn something about data science from me. There is no other reason for you to be here, reading this.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I enjoy teaching, mostly about statistics, predictive modeling, and anything having to do with R. I aim to teach from a more practical standpoint, mainly because I am not a theoretical mathematician/statistician. There is nothing wrong with being theoretical, I am just not smart enough for it. Materials related to courses I teach can be found below. Enjoy at your own risk.
